=======================
Contributing to Baruwa
=======================

There are so many ways to help Baruwa's development,

	* Blog about it.
	* Report bugs and request features
	* Submit patches for new and fixed behaviour
	* Join the mailing lists and share ideas
	* Donate to the project
	* Documentation
	* Translation
	
Reporting bugs
--------------
Please use the Github issue tracking system to report
bugs and request new features at https://github.com/akissa/baruwa/issues

Submitting patches
------------------
Baruwa source code is maintained in a git repository
at Github http://github.com/akissa/baruwa Please submit 
your patches to the mailing list and send me a pull 
request on Github.

Documentation
-------------
The documentation is part of the source, clone the
repo make the changes and submit the patches to the
mailing list and send me a pull request on Github.

You can also contribute tips and sightings on the baruwa
wiki at Github https://github.com/akissa/baruwa/wiki

Donations
---------
Donations are appreciated please use the Pledge 
system which accepts paypal payments 
http://pledgie.com/campaigns/12056

Translation
-----------
Clone the source code from Github, create a new language
if it does not exist, translate and test then send me
a pull request on Github
